key_talking_points: Sam Bennett (FLA) scores, extending Florida's lead to 5-4 with 17:53 remaining in the first period. Assists from Nate Schmidt (FLA) and Eetu Rodrigues (FLA).
Cody Perry (EDM) with a big hit on Dmitry Kulikov (FLA) in the corner. Perry trying to spark some momentum for the Oilers.
for_commentary_agent.context: A goal was just scored, and a big hit occurred shortly after, so the game has a high level of intensity right now. Maintain play-by-play coverage to capture the game's reaction to Florida extending their lead.

high_intensity_events.summary: Goal scored by Sam Bennett (FLA) assisted by Nate Schmidt (FLA) and Eetu Rodrigues (FLA).

task_details.specific_guidance: Focus on the Oilers' response to going down by a goal again early in the game. Monitor Connor McDavid's (EDM) reaction and ice time.
